discourse_list.title: Can RAI & DAI Become Sovereign Money & the Possibility of a Coinbase USDC Institutional Rewards 10-hour Time Lock to Veto Withdrawals w/Adrian of StrategicFinance CU on Drinks w/MakerDAO Delegates

content.content: The MakerBreaker “Dog-Meme Token” You Never Knew Existed On this episode we discussed the disadvantages and advantages of RWAs, MIP65 and what are the trust assumptions, all-things Switzerland and why this country is 10-steps ahead of the game, why Maker finds itself at the stage of the Coinbase USDC Institutional Rewards MIP, and can RAI & DAI become a sovereign money issued by a state authority. This was a truly enjoyable conversation with one of Maker’s brightest community members. @adcv provides a financial perspective into the current roster of RWA proposals, and his opinion does not disappoint. You don’t want to miss this episode, as well as MakerBreaker on Drinks with MakerDAO Delegates.  Watch the Decentralized Version on MakerTube.Lens and collect this Episode as an NFT!! https://lenstube.xyz/watch/0x01a2c6-0x06  Not Financial Advice This Content is for entertainment and informational purposes only, you should not construe any such information or other material as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice. Nothing contained on the Drinks With MakerDAO Delegates YouTube Channel, and/or MakerTube.lens Channel constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, endorsement, or offer by @adcv a.k.a Adrian, @twblack88  a.k.a, Tim Black, @ElProgreso a.k.a, Frank Cruz @rspa a.k.a, Raphael Spannocchi, Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC, Flipside Crypto, FeedBlack Loops LLC, or any third party service provider to buy or sell any cryptocurrencies, securities, or other financial instruments. Nothing in this YouTube Video constitutes professional and/or financial advice.  The Tastings: UpOnly! Adrian: Gazpacho!   Madrid, Spain  5 Stars      Raphael: Noctus 100 beer from Riegele Braumanufaktur, Augsburg, Bavaria  Germany   Stars      Tim Black:  Tap Water from the Bay Area, San Francisco CA  3.5 Stars     El Pro: Mint Watermelon Flavored Black Tea  3Stars    THE CENTRALIZED VERSION
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the advantages and disadvantages of RWAs, MIP65, and Maker's position in the Coinbase USDC Institutional Rewards MIP. The author also explores the possibility of RAI & DAI becoming sovereign money issued by a state authority. A community member provides a financial perspective on RWA proposals. The post also includes a section on the beverages consumed during the discussion.
